solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int singleNumber(int[] A) {--newline--        int ones = 0, twos = 0;--newline--        for(int i = 0; i < A.length; i++){--newline--            ones = (ones ^ A[i]) & ~twos;--newline--            twos = (twos ^ A[i]) & ~ones;--newline--        }--newline--        return ones;--newline--    }--newline--}
